Uses of Class
hevs.gdx2d.components.bitmaps.BitmapImage

  • Packages that use BitmapImage 
    Package Description
    hevs.gdx2d.lib
    The library wrapper that is built around libgdx.

    • Uses of BitmapImage in hevs.gdx2d.lib

      Methods in hevs.gdx2d.lib with parameters of type BitmapImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GdxGraphics.drawAlphaPicture(float posX, float posY, float alpha, BitmapImage img) 
      void GdxGraphics.drawAlphaPicture(float posX, float posY, float scale, float alpha, BitmapImage img) 
      void GdxGraphics.drawAlphaPicture(float posX, float posY, float centerX, float centerY, float angle, float scale, float alpha, BitmapImage img) 
      void GdxGraphics.drawAlphaPicture(Vector2 pos, float alpha, BitmapImage img)
      Draws a picture at position pos with a selectable alpha (transparency).
      void GdxGraphics.drawBackground(BitmapImage t, float i, float j)
      Draws an image in the background that will not move with the camera.
      void GdxGraphics.drawPicture(float posX, float posY, BitmapImage bitmap)
      Draws a picture at position (posX, posY) using a BitmapImage
      void GdxGraphics.drawTransformedPicture(float posX, float posY, float angle, float scale, BitmapImage bitmap)
      Draws a picture at position (posX, posY).
      void GdxGraphics.drawTransformedPicture(float posX, float posY, float angle, float width, float height, BitmapImage bitmap)
      Draws a picture at position (posX, posY) with a fixed width and height (not the one of the BitmapImage itself).
      void GdxGraphics.drawTransformedPicture(float posX, float posY, float centerX, float centerY, float angle, float scale, BitmapImage bitmap)
      Draws a picture at position (posX, posY) with a selectable center of rotation which is located at position offset by ( centerX, centerY).
